news.title: ‘A warm, open and generous man’ – Tributes paid to renowned architect and RTÉ presenter Hugh Wallace after death at 68
news.summary: Well-known architect and RTÉ presenter Hugh Wallace   has died aged 68.

news.title: The disappearance of Sandra Collins, 25 years on: ‘How long do you keep asking your sister’s killer to tell you where her body is?’
news.summary: How long do you keep asking your sister’s killer to tell you where her body is?

news.title: Fionnán Sheahan: Five questions for Micheál Martin’s report on the Jim Gavin farce to answer
news.summary: Expect the rose-tinted leak any day now to distract from the real meat of the report into the Jim Gavin debacle – how the most significant misjudgment in the term of the longest-serving Fianna Fáil leader since Éamon de Valera unfolded.

news.title: Ronan O’Gara sent off after ‘kung-fu’ kick from La Rochelle player sparks quickest red card in Top 14 history
news.summary: Ronan O’Gara was sent off in last night’s Top 14 defeat in Pau, the La Rochelle chief picking up a second yellow card during an astonishing 13-try clash that saw his out-half Antoine Hastoy ship the fastest red card in league history – 34 seconds.

news.title: Uninsured and unaccompanied learner driver who hit boy (8) and fled scene is jailed
news.summary: A man who struck a child while he was driving as an uninsured and unaccompanied learner driver has been jailed for eight months.

news.title: Detective who gave unclaimed bicycle to elderly man during Covid brings challenge over sick pay
news.summary: A detective who loaned an unclaimed bicycle out of garda storage to give it to a vulnerable elderly neighbour during Covid has successfully applied to the High Court to argue that an investigation into the incident caused his mental and physical deterioration, amounting to an 'injury while on duty'.

news.title: Ask Allison: My sister and her husband have come into money and it’s affecting our relationship – how do I fix this?
news.summary: My sister and her husband have recently come into money and it has completely thrown me. We used to all be so close and spend so much time together and now it is all gone. They are flying off here and there every time there is a school break and they are moving to a much bigger house soon.

news.title: Andrew formally stripped of last remaining royal titles by King Charles
news.summary: Andrew Mountbatten Windsor has been formally stripped of his last remaining royal titles following controversy over his links to paedophile Jeffrey Epstein.

news.title: Ciara Kelly: My ancestry DNA test results left me stunned. Could I possibly have a secret half-sister?
news.summary: A friend of mine was given one of those DNA tests recently, the ones where you can see where your ancestors hail from. We decided to do them together and spat happily into two test tubes with zero reflection.

news.title: Electric Picnic reveals first headliners for the 2026 Stradbally festival
news.summary: The Electric Picnic countdown has officially started as the first nine acts have been announced today for the 2026 festival in Stradbally Estate.
